name: Drump v Aliens
description:
Game Link: https://simmer.io/@prouddad69/drump-vs-aliens

Game Description:

(Please excuse our bad resolution and screen sizes, we are new to this. Thanks!)

Mr Drump from planet X is running for president and needs to collect as many votes falling from the sky as he can while avoiding being killed by enemy aliens hell bent on preventing him from becoming president. Help him to win by a lot!

Game Controls:

Move left: left arrow key/ A key

Move right: right arrow key/ D key

Jump: spacebar (there is infinite jumping heheh)

Group Name: YourProudDaddy

Group Members: Swann Tet Aung, Justin Ee
